column3: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

The Grateful Dead, they're my best friends. Their message of hope, peace, love, teamwork, creativity, imagination, celebration, the dance, the vision, the purpose, the passion all of the things I believe in makes me the luckiest Deadhead in the world.
The debt we owe to the play of imagination is incalculable.
My imagination makes me human and makes me a fool; it gives me all the world, and exiles me from it.
Memories, imagination, old sentiments, and associations are more readily reached through the sense of smell than through any other channel.
To think the world therefore a general Bedlam, or place of madmen, and oneself a physician, is the most necessary point of present wisdom: an important imagination, and the way to happiness.

We are the miracle of force and matter making itself over into imagination and will. Incredible. The Life Force experimenting with forms. You for one. Me for another. The Universe has shouted itself alive. We are one of the shouts.
All the works of man have their origin in creative fantasy. What right have we then to depreciate imagination.
For imagination sets the goal picture which our automatic mechanism works on. We act, or fail to act, not because of will, as is so commonly believed, but because of imagination.
My imagination is my polestar; I steer by that.
My imagination can picture no fairer happiness than to continue living for art.

In the beginning, we had a great deal of freedom, and Jerry wrote completely out of his imagination - very, very freely. We even had no editorial supervision to speak of, because they were in such a rush to get the thing in before deadline. But later on we were restricted.

In this drawing we just let our imagination run wild. We visualized Superman toys, games, and a radio show - that was before TV - and Superman movies. We even visualized Superman billboards. And it's all come true.
We especially need imagination in science.
With the brush we merely tint, while the imagination alone produces colour.
Imagination creates some big monsters.
It would be a bitter cosmic joke if we destroy ourselves due to atrophy of the imagination.
I do a lot of curiosity buying; I buy it if I like the album cover, I buy it if I like the name of the band, anything that sparks my imagination.
A writer should have the precision of a poet and the imagination of a scientist.
The product of the scientific imagination is a new vision of relations - like that of artistic imagination.
Our world faces a true planetary emergency. I know the phrase sounds shrill, and I know it's a challenge to the moral imagination.
You are indebted to you imagination for three-fourths of your importance.
No matter how mistaken Communist ideas may be, the experience and knowledge gained by trying them out have given a tremendous impetus to thought and imagination.
Those Dutchmen had hardly any imagination or fantasy, but their good taste and their scientific knowledge of composition were enormous.
For strange effects and extraordinary combinations we must go to life itself, which is always far more daring than any effort of the imagination.
I have enough love to last me a lifetime! Thank God I'll never lose my imagination and my passion. That's really what it is. I'm still passionate about what I do.
